# Cultures.today

> An interactive web application for exploring and documenting cultures around the world through an interactive map interface.

## About

Cultures.today enables users to discover cultures plotted on a world map, view detailed information including languages and multimedia content, and contribute cultural knowledge by drawing geographic boundaries and submitting culture data.

## Features

- Interactive World Map with culture boundaries overlaid on a 3D globe
- Boundary Drawing Tool for defining cultural regions with brush-based painting
- Culture Details including languages, phrases with audio, flags, and multimedia
- Culture Submission via a multi-step wizard with validation
- Google Authentication for user accounts
- Spatial Queries powered by PostGIS to find cultures at any map location

## Tech Stack

- Next.js 16, React 19, MapLibre GL, Mantine 8, Prisma 7, PostgreSQL/PostGIS, MinIO

## URL: https://cultures.today
